name: Legends of Venari
storyline: After Earth’s collapse, Caerras became humanity’s refuge, thriving with Kore energy and mystical creatures called Venari. Emerge as the next generation of Seekers to save the planet from a new looming threat.
summary: Legends of Venari is a creature collection RPG that is being built on the Ethereum blockchain network. LoV, in its current state (the Beta Season), is an idle browser-based game where players catch Venari creatures. LoV is an iterative project built alongside the web3 community as features get rolled out over seasons (3-4 Months).
